definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The wave form of each main physical quantities are drawn by computer.
sentences.chinese: 還利用計算機繪圖畫出了各主要物理量的波形圖。

sentences.english: The non-complete characteristics of the test wave as well as the wave reset of the given signal are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了檢測波形的非完整性以及給定信號的波形設定。

sentences.english: The non-complete characteristics of the test wave as well as the wave reset of the given signal are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了檢測波形的非完整性以及給定信號的波形設定。

sentences.english: The final issue is the quality of the dimming waveform itself.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個是調光波形本身的質量問題。

sentences.english: The numerical simulation and experimental research of steam-water separator with cor- rugated plate is carried out in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文對波形板汽水分離器進行了數值模擬和試驗研究。

sentences.english: Ramp, triangle, noise, and DC waveforms.
sentences.chinese: 匝道，三角形，噪聲和直流波形。

sentences.english: At last we make some characteristic waveform about this bandgap voltage reference.
sentences.chinese: 文中最後給出了此基準電壓源的各種性能的仿真波形。

sentences.english: DV Doppler waveform of this dextrocardia fetus showed a nearly ab- sent atrial systole wave.
sentences.chinese: 右位心胎兒DV多普勒血流波形的心房收縮波近缺失。

sentences.english: A clipped waveform indicates a need to improve electrostatic shielding.
sentences.chinese: 限幅的波形表明需要改進靜電屏蔽。

sentences.english: The limit of the range resolution of a LFM radar depends on the bandwidth of transmitted waveform.
sentences.chinese: 線性調頻雷達的極限分辨力取決於發射波形的帶寬。

sentences.english: Two methods to constrUct non-sinusoidal oscillationwaviness function of mold are pmposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了兩種構造結晶器非正弦振動波形函數的方法。

sentences.english: The interference of the precursor and the slightly delayed main waveform can explain this structure.
sentences.chinese: 前驅的干擾和主波形輕微的延遲可以解釋這個結構。

sentences.english: No obvious directivity occurs in the songs of black cicada.
sentences.chinese: 黑蟬鳴聲的波形結構無明顯的方向性。

sentences.english: The bottom a confusion of voices in the frequency in undee graph has apparent change.
sentences.chinese: 波形圖中音頻中的底噪有明顯變化。

sentences.english: The morphing can happen on the fly, depending on applications such as beamforming, Raytheon officials say.
sentences.chinese: 其變形能根據應用，如波形形成在運行中進行。

sentences.english: The DC waveforms and their judgement of on-load tap-changer in transformer are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了變壓器有載分接開關的直流波形和其判斷情況。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
harmonious/to adjust/to tune (e.g. wireless receiver)/to bring into harmony
